title: Priesthood Keys: Keys Are the Authority of God
short_title: Priesthood Keys: Keys Are the Authority of God
content: Priesthood Keys: Keys Are the Authority of God
The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

(2 of 4) Elder Hallstrom teaches about the line of priesthood authority that extends back to the Savior and the restoration of the priesthood in this last dispensation. Keys are the God-given authority to direct the use of the priesthood on earth.
